page.title: 18Crowthorne Library
page.content: Our library is a bright modern building. It houses{books}for adults and children,{magazines, tapes}and {records,}all of which may be borrowed by the people of Crowthorne. The library also acts as a{source {of information}about activities and events in the village. From time to time the schools in the village mount {exhibitions of work. Last year 1500 people joined the library which is{computer linked}to others in Berkshire and across the country. It is even possible now to trace a book in another country! The most{popular books}borrowed from the library were{historical {romantic novels. Following a visit to Africa, our librarian launched an appeal for children's books.These are due to be sent to the Gambia shortly.
